title: #271: Live Free Or Die | John Bush
description:
John Bush, the founder of the Live Free Academy, stops by to discuss how to break out of the system with some very simple steps to remove yourself from state control.

Whether we are talking about the school system or the banking networks, the key is networking with other like-minded individuals to become less dependent on governments and more dependent on each other. John’s creation of the Freedom Cell Network has gathered almost 34,000 people together into a group capable of helping people decentralize, become self-reliant, be more independent, and exit the collapsing system before it is too late.
